channel.title: Perspective through the lense of Lotta Moberg, PhD, CFA
channel.description: My research and analysis synthesizes global economics, politics, and policy as a macroeconomic analyst at the Dynamic Allocations Strategies team at William Blair.

item.title: Conversation with Stephen Moore and Randall Wray on the current economy
item.description: A debate from two sides of the ideological spectrum on what should be done in the US covid economy.
item.author: lotta@lottamoberg.com (Lotta Moberg, PhD, CFA)
